description: A beautiful mix of fresh, clean flavours.
keywords: Prawn salad,Pescatarian,Prawn,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Vietnamese Salad Of Grilled Prawns With Papaya Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 12 large large raw prawns, peeled and deveined, heads and tails removed
1 red chilli, deseeded and very finely chopped
1.5 tbs mint, save 1/2 tbs sprigs to serve
1 green papaya, deseeded, quartered lengthways, and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the grill on its highest setting. Spread the prawns out on a foil-lined grill rack, brush with the oil, and grill for 2-3 minutes, or until they turn pink.

Meanwhile, whisk the vinegar, sugar, chilli, garlic, fish sauce, lime juice, and 75ml cold water in a bowl until the sugar dissolves. Add the prawns and stir to coat in the dressing. Leave to cool completely.
Add the mint, papaya, and cucumber and toss. Transfer the salad to a serving platter, with the prawns and mint sprigs on top.
